description:
Subscribe for more! https://www.youtube.com/austinevans
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@austintechtips
Instagram: https://instagram.com/austinnotduncan
Twitter: https://twitter.com/austinnotduncan
Threads: https://www.threads.net/@austinnotduncan

In this deep dive, I explore the rollercoaster history of Sony's most ambitious console ever - the PlayStation 3. From its rocky $600 launch to becoming a surprising success, the PS3's journey is filled with fascinating twists, groundbreaking tech, and high-stakes drama. I break down how Sony's massive gamble nearly backfired, the console's evolution over time, and its lasting impact on the gaming industry.

Other episodes of our PlayStation history series:
PS1: https://youtu.be/wZb2FTKN-f8
PS2: https://youtu.be/wPoXrMAPOLA
PSP: https://youtu.be/ZA79OOwdXIs

Chapter Titles:
0:00 Introducing the PlayStation 3
2:45 The (Over) Ambitious Cell
5:07 Expensive, Complicated and Late
8:22 Launching the Beast
11:53 Problems Brewing
14:25 Gaming on the
title: I bought EVERY PS3
